snippet: The child was critically injured in the fall from an eighth-floor window on Bradhurst Avenue shortly before 3:30 p.m., the authorities said.
abstract: Woman holding baby dies after jumping out eighth-floor window of Harlem apartment building; infant is in critical but stable condition at Harlem Hospital Center.

byline.original: By ANDY NEWMAN and RANDY LEONARD

lead_paragraph: The child was critically injured in the fall from an eighth-floor window on Bradhurst Avenue shortly before 3:30 p.m., the authorities said.

headline.seo: Mother Dies in Leap From Harlem Building
headline.main: Mother Leaps With an Infant and Dies
headline.print_headline: Mother Leaps With an Infant and Dies
